title: Dreamworks Co-Founder Envisions 90% Reduction in Animation Labor Through AI Revolution
description: In a revelation that could reshape the very foundations of animated filmmaking, Jeffrey Katzenberg, the co-founder of Dreamworks, has boldly endorsed the integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI) into the animation process. Speaking at the Bloomberg New Economy Forum in Singapore, Katzenberg unfolded a vision where AI could potentially reduce animation labor by a staggering 90%. ... Read more
